text: Fort Campbell is a United States Army post on the border of Tennessee and Kentucky. It is west of Clarksville and northwest of Nashville. The fort is named after William Bowen Campbell, the last Whig Governor of Tennessee.A History of Fort Campbell, Kentucky , 14 August 2006. title: Fort Campbell
